name: Ghost of Xabregas
description:
"A Young Girl tries to Escape from a ghost in Xabregas"

Joaquina is a young portuguese girl living in the 90's, who finds herself inside an abandoned Factory in Xabregas. But little did the young girl know that the factory was haunted by a spooky ghost! Will Joaquina escape this haunted factory??

Features
  • Survive the attacks from the ghost haunting the factory
  • Find the factory's secrets
  • Discover the 3 endings to this short game!
Controls
  • Arrow keys - Move the player character
  • Z - Interact with objects and npcs
The Studio

Unexpected Quest®  produced by Nebula Riders Studios is an academic project developed for an internal GameJam like event. The objective was to build an narrative-driven gameboy game within 1 week.
